alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Caddo; Canadian; Grady; Kingfisher; Washita (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 11 at 2:25AM CDT until July 11 at 3:15AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Washita County in western Oklahoma... Southern Kingfisher County in central Oklahoma... Northwestern Grady County in central Oklahoma... Northern Caddo County in southwestern Oklahoma... Southern Blaine County in northwestern Oklahoma... Canadian County in central Oklahoma... * Until 315 AM CDT. * At 225 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles south of Greenfield to 5 miles west of Bridgeport to near Eakly, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Northwestern Oklahoma City, El Reno, Yukon, Piedmont, Hinton, Union City, Minco, Geary, Okarche, Hydro, Cashion, Binger, Calumet, Eakly, Lookeba, Colony, Bridgeport, Greenfield, Cogar, and Concho. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Blaine; Caddo; Canadian; Grady; Kingfisher; Washita
